data.eml:eml: A remarkable new species of Coeliccia from the Tuyen Lam Lake area, Lam Dong, southern Vietnam (Odonata: Zygoptera: Platycnemididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dow, Rory A. (2016): A remarkable new species of Coeliccia from the Tuyen Lam Lake area, Lam Dong, southern Vietnam (Odonata: Zygoptera: Platycnemididae). Zootaxa 4103 (5): 481-486, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.5.6
